overview:
John Geis is currently the COO of Dabble - an online marketplace for affordable, in-person classes. Previously, John was a Principal at Expense Consulting, a Connecticut based consulting firm. Prior to joining Expense Consulting, John was a co-founder of SavvyGoose.com, an online daily sweepstakes platform.

Before getting involved in the startup world, John was an investment banking analyst at BMO Capital Markets, one of the largest diversified financial services providers in North America. He started his career as a consultant with BearingPoint (fka KPMG Consulting) where he implemented risk and compliance strategies for global financial services companies. John holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Finance from Babson College.
